channel.title: Delta [Attacking]
channel.description:
I get this error when i attack an NPC.
[code]Error with player 1, Ashley Connection from 127.0.0.1:65111 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.followDirection(client.java:2259) at client.process(client.java:14835) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Ashley[/code]
Anyone got a fix for it please ;)?.

item.title: Delta [Attacking]
item.dc:creator: @I_Ashley_I I Ashley I
item.description:
@I_Ashley_I wrote:

Any ideas how to fix it ;)?.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta [Attacking]
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It’s obviously something to do with the followDirection() method.

By the way, weren’t you banned?
